name: 届けたい詩 五十鈴
flavor_text: この世界に42しか音楽を創らなかった神様に、ケンカを売ってやるんだ！
ability: 【A】［Place 1 Climax from Hand into Waiting Room］ When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, you may pay the Cost. If you did, choose 1 《武器》 or 《魔法》 Character from your Waiting Room, return it to Hand.
【A】 When this card Direct Attacks, choose 1 of your other Characters, during this turn, it gets +1500 Power.

name: 美少女アイドル？てとら
flavor_text: ボクこそ輝く夜空の一等星！正統派美少女銀河系アイドルてとらだよ！
ability: 【A】 When this card's battle opponent becomes REVERSE, you may choose 1 Character in your Waiting Room, return it to Hand. If you did, choose 1 card from your Hand, place it into Waiting Room.
【A】 When this card becomes REVERSE, if this card's battle opponent's Level is higher than your opponent's Level, you may REVERSE that Character.

name: ＜影遁＞アカツキ
flavor_text: おまえの圧倒的強さは…私の弱さよりもずっと脆い！
ability: 【C】 If you have 2 or less Climaxes in Waiting Room, this card gets -1 Level in your Hand.
【C】 If you have 3 or more other 《武器》 or 《魔法》 Characters, this card gets +1500 Power.

【A】 When this card is placed on Stage from Hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your Deck, choose up to 1 card, add it to Hand, place the remaining cards into Waiting Room. X is equals to the number of your 《武器》 or 《魔法》 Characters.

name: シロエの弟子 ミノリ
flavor_text: シロエさんのような道を切り拓く人に…！
ability: 【A】 At the beginning of your Climax phase, choose 1 of your Characters, during this turn, it gets +500 Power.

【S】 CONCENTRATION ［① REST this card］ Flip the top 4 cards of your Deck, place them into Waiting Room. For each Climax among those cards, search your Deck for up to 1 《武器》 or 《魔法》 Character and show it to your opponent, add it to Hand, shuffle the Deck afterwards.

name: “２刀流”にゃん太
ability: 【C】 If your Stock has 2 or less cards, this card gets +1500 Power.

name: ウィリアム＝マサチューセッツ
flavor_text: 急げ！切り込みはシロエ班だ！
ability: 【C】 For each of your other 《武器》 or 《魔法》 Characters, this card gets +500 Power.

【A】 When this card attacks, if 「ゲーマーの意地」 is in your Climax slot, reveal the top card of your Deck. If that card is a 《武器》 or 《魔法》 Character, add it to Hand. (If not, return revealed card to its original position)

name: “フルレイド”シロエ
flavor_text: そうだ。必ず帰る、みんなのところへ
ability: 【C】 If all your Characters are 《武器》 or 《魔法》, this card gets +1000 Power.
【A】 When this card becomes REVERSE in battle, if you have 1 or less other 《武器》 or 《魔法》 Characters, place this card into Clock.

name: ゲーマーの意地
flavor_text: 俺たちはエルダーテイルで過ごした…長い長い間過ごした…
ability: 【C】 All your Characters get +1000 Power, +1 Soul.
(Arch：When this card is triggered, choose 1 Climax from your Waiting Room, you may return it to Hand)

name: ゲーマーの意地武闘家 カナミ
ability: 【C】 If you have another Character with 「シロエ」 in its name, this card gets +1000 Power, gains 『【A】ENCORE ［Place 1 Character from Hand into Waiting Room］』.
【A】 When this card attacks, if you have 3 or more other 《武器》 or 《魔法》 Characters, during this turn, this card gets +2000 Power.
